title: Should You Buy a $500 MacBook Air?
description: For $500 you can get a used MacBook but does the laptop still hold up in 2018? Why Does the MacBook Air Exist?  Original Apple MacBook Air 11" review:   Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
